attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think more people would like the opertunity to eat healthier and go to a gym and tone up and keep fit, but the prices for this are rediculous, i think people eating burgers and everything do so cause mainly its faster and a cheaper option, if someting was set up for people on what to eat and help for people who cant afford gyms and that lot it would make it easier for the people who want to do this but dont have a clue where to start. i bet many people agree with me on this one!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
